item.title: Johnson to overrule scientists and ease lockdown
item.description: List of businesses allowed to reopen on July 4 extended as 2-metre distancing rule reduced
item.content:encoded: Boris Johnson will on Tuesday reject misgivings from some leading scientists and press ahead with a plan to cut...
item.media:credit: George Parker, Jim Pickard, Laura Hughes and Sebastian Payne in London

Jim Pickard
Sebastian Payne

item.title: Apple announces transition away from Intel chips
item.description: Tim Cook hails ‘historic day’ as company moves to use in-house designs
item.content:encoded: Apple will transition from using Intel chips to processors designed in-house, in a shift that chief executive Tim Cook...
item.dc:creator: Patrick McGee

item.title: Stimulus hopes lift Wall Street as US coronavirus cases rise
item.description: Investor sentiment tested by surge in infections in Asia, Europe and Americas
item.content:encoded: US stocks climbed and gold rose towards its highest level since 2012 as investors bet on more fiscal stimulus from...
item.media:credit: Harry Dempsey and Bryce Elder in London and Hudson Lockett in Hong Kong
